summary: A collection of utilities that define a common interface and OS‑specific implementations for detecting the virtualization environment (hypervisor type, guest/host role, container runtime) on target machines, exposing these details as Ansible facts.
business_intent: Allow Ansible playbooks to automatically discover and react to the virtualization platform of managed hosts, enabling conditional logic, resource allocation, and configuration tailored to hypervisors, containers, or bare‑metal systems.
